name: Awakening of the gods
description:
Congratulations! You finally made it! After years of study and travel around the world, you have gathered what it takes to resurrect the gods. The same gods of legends and stories that your father used to tell when you were a child. Unfortunately, divine beings were not the only thing that you managed to awaken and now the world is about to be swallowed up in darkness and the only thing that can stop that is you. 

At least that's what the Gods said and it's not like they've been wrong before, is it? But do you really have what it takes to stop the end of the world?
